channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. The dancers are excited when their regional costumes arrive, but when they realise they are the wrong ones, everyone worries that they may not have their costumes in time. Eldon tries to talk to Michelle, but when she continues to ignore him, he decides to move on for good.
